Please open FYP_Final in Jupyter notebook for best results


INSTALLATIONS

If there are  any difficulties using the Pip installer, visit: https://pip.pypa.io/en/stable/cli/pip_install/
Please use pip package installer to install the following via these commands:

pip install pandas

pip install numpy

pip install seaborn

pip install --upgrade tensorflow

pip install keras

pip install -U keras-tuner

pip install matplotlib

pip install -U scikit-learn

pip install scipy



VERSIONS USED IN THIS MODEL:

pandas==1.0.1

numpy==1.19.5

seaborn==0.10.0

tensorflow==2.4.1

keras==2.4.0

kerastuner=1.0.2

matplotlib==3.3.3

sklearn==0.22.1
